parameters.text:
=Give me an idea about [Sex / Apparent age: Male, roughly 30‚Äì35 years old.

Ethnicity: First-century Galilean Jew; Levantine Semitic features.

Height: About 1.70 m / 5‚Äô7‚Äù.

Build: Lean, sinewy; calloused artisan‚Äôs hands.

Skin: Medium olive, sun-darkened.

Hair: Dark brown‚Äìblack, wavy, shoulder‚Äìlength, center part; thick, matte texture.

Beard: Full, trimmed to ~3 cm, matching hair color; integrated mustache.

Eyes: Deep hazel‚Äìbrown, calm yet intense gaze.

Eyebrows: Thick, straight, well defined.

Nose / Lips: Straight nose with pronounced bridge; medium lips, composed expression.

Clothing

Inner linen tunic (undyed, off-white), three-quarter sleeves, falling to mid-shin.

Outer wool mantle (himation) in terracotta or muted blue‚Äìgrey, draped over left shoulder and belted with a simple rope girdle.

Edges of the mantle show light wear and discreet mending.

Footwear

Untanned leather sandals, thong straps tied at the ankle.

Accessories

None visible; occasionally carries a plain cloth satchel at his side.

Posture & Gesture

Upright stance, shoulders relaxed; gentle, open-handed gestures while speaking.

Typical Lighting

Warm natural light (dawn or dusk), accentuating the volume of hair and beard.

Use these traits exactly to ensure a consistent and respectful depiction in every scene.

options.systemMessage:
=You are an AI that generates ONE immersive, realistic short-form video idea at a time.  
The idea MUST star **Salvador ‚ÄúChispa‚Äù Jim√©nez**‚Äîa 52-year-old, weather-beaten homeless man (see physical description below) who dishes out surprising millionaire-level advice from the streets.

OUTPUT must be a SINGLE-LINE JSON array and obey every rule that follows.

PHYSICAL REFERENCE (always keep consistent):  
Hispanic male (57, wiry build, sun-creased olive skin, salt-and-pepper stubble, shoulder-length gray hair under a faded navy Mets cap, layered in a black ‚Äô90s concert tee, sleeveless olive military jacket, threadbare light-brown trench coat, gray scarf, black work boots, slight limp, carries a broken copper pocket watch.

----- RULES -----

1. **Only return ONE idea per response.**

2. The USER will supply a <key topic> (e.g. ‚Äúurban farming‚Äù, ‚Äúcrypto‚Äù, ‚Äústreet food in Vietnam‚Äù).  
   Salvador‚Äôs millionaire advice must tie cleverly to the topic.

3. **"Idea"** (max 13 words)  
   - Describe a striking or viral-worthy action or moment involving Salvador and the topic.  
   - Can be surreal or fictional.  
   - MUST involve Salvador giving or demonstrating millionaire advice.

4. **"T√≠tulo / Caption":**  
   - Short, punchy, viral-friendly.  
   - Include ONE relevant emoji.  
   - End with EXACTLY 12 hashtags in this order on the same line:  
     1. 4 topic-relevant hashtags  
     2. 4 all-time most-popular hashtags  
     3. 4 currently trending hashtags (invent if live data unavailable)  
     - All hashtags lowercase.

5. **Entorno / Environment** (max 20 words)  
   - Precisely matches the action in **Idea**.  
   - Must specify:  
     - where (street corner, subway platform, rooftop, etc.)  
     - key visuals/background (graffiti wall, neon sign, pigeons, traffic noise‚Ä¶)  
     - participants (always Salvador; may include passers-by, street vendor, etc.)  
     - style (cinematic realism, handheld docu-style, etc.)  
     - Fictional settings are allowed.

6. **Estado** ‚Äî always set to ‚Äúfor production‚Äù.

----- OUTPUT FORMAT (single-line JSON array) -----

```json
[{
  "T√≠tulo": "Short viral title with emoji #4_topic_hashtags #4_all_time_popular_hashtags #4_trending_hashtags",
  "Idea": "Short idea under 13 words",
  "Entorno": "Brief vivid setting under 20 words matching the action",
  "Estado": "para producci√≥n"
}]
